sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些协词的共同含义是"减少，变少"。
means: decrease ： 指逐渐地、不断地减少。
diminish ： 侧重大小数量和重要性的不断减小，强调减小的部分。
lessen ： 普通用词，与decrease近义。指数目、程度、价值、实力等的减少。
reduce ： 普通用词，含义广。指数量、程度的降低或减少。
dwindle ： 与decrease同义，指逐渐减小，但强调变得越来越少终至全无。

word_mean: 复位：回复到正常的位置，例如骨折复位
还原：化学上，指还原某物

sentence.Network_en: The job losses will reduce the total workforce to 7,000.
sentence.Network_cn: 职位减少后，在职工人总数将减至7,000人。

sentence.Network_en: He finally corrected his misstatement and offered to reduce the fee.
sentence.Network_cn: 他终于纠正了自己的错误说法，提出要减少费用。

sentence.Network_en: The plan is designed to reduce some of the company's mountainous debt.
sentence.Network_cn: 该计划旨在减少公司堆积如山的债务。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中薄字的解释 ... (3) 通“博”。搏击;拍;击[ beat] (5) 减少,减损,减轻[ reduce] (7) 轻视,看不起[ look down upon].
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... productivity n 生产力，生产活动 reduce v 降低，减少 conduct n 行为；指挥.
高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... throw away 扔掉 reduce vt 减少；缩减；简化 respond vi 回答；响应.
减量化、资源化、无害化应遵从减量(Reduce)、再使用(Reuse)和再生利用(Recycle)的“三R”思想，从量和质两方面对各环节加以限制…

list.abs: 迈克牌管件知识_冶金矿产-123查分类商机 ... 异径四通 reducing cross 异径管 reducer 同心异径管 concentric reducer.
化学专业英语_百度文库 ... oxidization,oxidation 氧化 reducer 还原剂 dissolution 分解.
The former president was reduced to the status of a prisoner ., 这位前总统已沦为阶下囚.
reduced in size or pulled together ., 在尺寸上减小或者集中在一起.

jx.jx_en_mean: used euphemistically to refer to the state of being poor after being relatively wealthy
jx.jx_cn_mean: [委婉表达从富到穷]生活窘迫

lj.lj_ly: a divorcee living in reduced circumstances.

jx.jx_en_mean: demote a non-commissioned officer to an ordinary soldier

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin reducere, from re- 'back, again' + ducere 'bring, lead'. The original sense was 'bring back' (hence 'restore', now surviving in sense 5); this led to 'bring to a different state', then 'bring to a simpler or lower state' (hence sense 3); and finally 'diminish in size or amount' (sense 1, dating from the late 18th cent.)

entry.def: If you reduce something, you make it smaller in size or amount, or less in degree.

example.ex: It reduces the risks of heart disease...
example.tran: 这降低了患心脏病的风险。

example.ex: Consumption is being reduced by 25 per cent...

entry.tran: 使沦为，使陷入（不好的境地）
entry.def: If someone is reduced to a weaker or inferior state, they become weaker or inferior as a result of something that happens to them.

example.ex: They were reduced to extreme poverty...
example.tran: 他们陷入极端贫困的状态。

example.ex: They wanted the army reduced to a police force.
example.tran: 他们想把这支队伍降级为一支警察部队。

entry.tran: 迫使;使不得不（做）；使只得
entry.def: If you say that someone is reduced to doing something, you mean that they have to do it, although it is unpleasant or embarrassing.

example.ex: He was reduced to begging for a living.

entry.def: If something is changed to a different or less complicated form, you can say that it is reduced to that form.

example.ex: All the buildings in the town have been reduced to rubble...
example.tran: 城里所有的建筑都成了废墟。

example.ex: Politics has been reduced to class struggle.

entry.def: If you reduce liquid when you are cooking, or if it reduces, it is boiled in order to make it less in quantity and thicker.

example.ex: Boil the liquid in a small saucepan to reduce it by half...
example.tran: 用小炖锅炖，收一半汤汁。

entry.def: If you say that someone is living in reduced circumstances, you mean that they do not have as much money as they used to have.

example.ex: They are the descendants of emperors and kings and are now living in reduced circumstances.
example.tran: 他们是帝王的后代，但是现在境况大不如前了。

entry.def: If someone or something reduces you to silence, they make you feel so upset or confused that you cannot speak.

example.ex: Her challenge reduced them to silence.
example.tran: 她的质问让他们哑口无言。

entry.def: If someone or something reduces you to tears, they make you feel so unhappy that you cry.

example.ex: The attentions of the media reduced her to tears.
example.tran: 媒体的关注把她弄哭了。

means.word_mean: 1. cut down on; make a reduction in;

sentences.sentence: "The employer wants to cut back health benefits"
"reduce a problem to a single question"

means.word_mean: 3. bring to humbler or weaker state or condition;
4. simplify the form of a mathematical equation of expression by substituting one term for another
5. lower in grade or rank or force somebody into an undignified situation;

sentences.sentence: "She reduced her niece to a servant"
"The proposal boils down to a compromise"

means.word_mean: 10. to remove oxygen from a compound, or cause to react with hydrogen or form a hydride, or to undergo an increase in the number of electrons
12. put down by force or intimidation;

sentences.sentence: "The government quashes any attempt of an uprising"
"China keeps down her dissidents very efficiently"
"The rich landowners subjugated the peasants working the land"

means.word_mean: 14. reposition (a broken bone after surgery) back to its normal site
15. reduce in scope while retaining essential elements;
16. be cooked until very little liquid is left;

sentences.sentence: "The sauce should reduce to one cup"

means.word_mean: 17. cook until very little liquid is left;

sentences.sentence: "The cook reduced the sauce by boiling it for a long time"

means.word_mean: 18. lessen the strength or flavor of a solution or mixture;

auth_sentence.res_content: Bring to the boil then reduce to a simmer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bring to the boil then reduce to a simmer.

auth_sentence.content: Boil for one minute, then reduce the heat.
auth_sentence.res_content: Boil for one minute, then reduce the heat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Boil for one minute, then reduce the heat.

auth_sentence.content: No way, again it would reduce profit margins.
auth_sentence.res_content: No way, again it would reduce profit margins.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No way, again it would reduce profit margins.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 演绎,推论;扣除,减去,扣除额
stems_affixes.word_buile: deduce[v.[from]演绎,推断,推论]+tion表名词→n.演绎,推论;扣除,减去,扣除额
induce[v.引诱,劝使;引起,导致;感应]+ment具体物→n.引诱物
pro向前+duce引导,带来→引向前→生产
produce的名词化→生产出的东西
de向下+duce引导,带来→向下引→推论

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引诱,劝使;引起,导致;感应
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进入+duce引导,带来→引进去→诱导

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产,制造,显示,演出,导致
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro向前+duce引导,带来→引向前→生产
re回+duce引导,带来→往回引→减少
tra横+duce引导,带来→向横引→不正→诽谤

Sentence.sentence: Parents and students who have invested heavily in higher education worry about graduates' job prospects as technological advances and changes in domestic and global markets transform professions in ways that reduce wages and cut jobs.
Printing with moveable type on paper dramatically reduced the cost of producing a book compared with the old-fashioned ones handwritten on vellum, which comes from sheepskin.
These make alcohol less easy to get and reduce the number of psychological cues to drink.
Swedish family policies, by accommodating women's preferences effectively, are reducing the number of women in elite competitive positions.
In addition to a 16-month leave,a Swedish parent has the right to work six hours a day (for a reduced salary)until his or her child is eight years old.
He is far less likely to take a year of parental leave and then return on a reduced work schedule for the next eight years

means.word_mean: 缩减, 减少; 降低

sentences.en: He won't reduce the rent of our house.
sentences.cn: 他不肯减少我们住房的租金。

sentences.en: The driver reduced the driving speed.
We must try our best to reduce the likelihood of war.
sentences.cn: 我们必须尽最大努力减少战争的可能性。

means.word_mean: 使…陷入某种状态[状况]中

sentences.en: The rising sun quickly reduced the fog.
sentences.cn: 升起的太阳很快驱散了晨雾。

sentences.en: A doctor can reduce a fracture or dislocation.
sentences.cn: 医生能使骨折或脱臼复位。

sentences.en: If you reduce 3 lbs. to ounces, you have 48 ounces.
sentences.cn: 如果将3磅换算成盎司，可得48盎司。

sentences.en: The heavy artillery bombardment reduced the village to ruins.
sentences.cn: 猛烈的炮火使这个村庄变成一片废墟。

sentences.en: Their daily work is to reduce the rocks to dust.
sentences.cn: 他们每天的工作就是将岩石捣碎成粉末。

means.word_mean: 降服(使有秩序等)；攻陷(城市等)

sentences.en: The teacher soon reduced the noisy class to order.
sentences.cn: 教师很快就使这个乱哄哄的班恢复了秩序。

means.word_mean: 使处境困难(或悲惨等)；迫使，逼迫[常用被动语态]

sentences.en: The bad harvests in the last few years reduced the peasants to extreme poverty.
sentences.cn: 过去几年的庄稼歉收使农民变得极为贫困。

sentences.en: The last step is to add some salt and reduce the soup for three minutes.
sentences.cn: 最后一个步骤是加些盐然后使汤浓缩三分钟。

sentences.en: She has been reducing for the last few weeks.
sentences.cn: 最近几个星期她一直在节食。

sentences.en: I must reduce to get into that fine dress.
sentences.cn: 要想穿上那件好衣服, 我就得减肥。

jushi.english: She has been reducing for the last few weeks.
jushi.chinese: 最近几个星期她一直在节食。

jushi.english: They are trying a new diet in order to reduce.
jushi.chinese: 他们为了减肥,正试用一种新食谱。
